root.name: Tron: Legacy
root.description: Overview Tron: Legacy is a pinball machine that is based on the movie, also titled Tron: Legacy. Tron was developed and manufactured by Stern Electronics in 2011. Tron: Legacy was released at a price of $5,699. Tron: Legacy also has a numbered limited edition version with additional features. Dimensions The size dimensions of the Tron: Legacy pinball machine are: Height - 56"Width - 27"Depth - 55"Weight - 250 lbs.
